Introduction

W!TCHX also stylized as WiTCHX, is a five-member girl group under Inmedia and Artform Entertainment. They made their debut on November 6, 2024 with the digital single "Blala".

The group first started appearing on Inmedia's website sometime in 2019, but there was no official information about them shared until 2022 until they made their first ever public appearance at Expo 2020 Dubai concert, announcing their group name and lineup, consisting of Bella, Aya, Mago, and Mari. However, the SNS posts with the original lineup were deleted on April 3, 2022, and replaced by posts featuring the new lineup, confirming Bella had left the group, and introducing a new member, Mina.

In June 2022, WiTCHES announced their debut and introduced Bella as a new member. Despite plans, their debut was delayed to 2023, and Mina left the group. New members, including Rucia (later Lucia), Seohyun (Mew), and Niaa, joined, while Minju and Aya departed. On August 8, 2023, they rebranded as WiTCHX and were added to Inter B.D Entertainment's website in September 2023.

On January 9, 2024, it was announced that their debut, which was supposed to happen in 2023, would be in March. However, on March 8, Mari shared that their debut had been delayed for a month. Still, in April, the group hadn’t released any news about their debut date.

W!TCHX released an official profile photo on August 26, 2024, hinting at a potential debut before the end of the year, with the current lineup being Lucia, Mago, Mari, Niaa, and Mew.
